TextEng: I am sorry, I have nothing to heal you with.
I can help. <StartHighlight>[Lay hands on him.]</Start>
I can heal you. <StartHighlight>[Cast a healing spell on him.]</Start>
Text: 치료해 줄 수 있어요. <StartHighlight>[치유 주문을 건다.]</Start>

TextEng: Here, drink this. <StartHighlight>[Use a healing potion on him.]</Start>
Here, let me try this. <StartAction>[Use a healing kit.]</Start>
Text: 자, 이걸 써 볼게요. <StartAction>[치료용 키트를 사용한다.]</Start>

TextEng: Drogan never said you would be this hard to find. I'm <FirstName>.
Text: 드로건 스승님은 당신 찾기가 이렇게 어려울 거라곤 안 하셨는데. 전 <FirstName>이에요.

TextEng: My name is <FullName>. Drogan sent me to get your help.
Text: 제 이름은 <FullName>이에요. 드로건 스승님이 당신 도움을 받으라고 보내셨어요.

TextEng: I am <FirstName>. My teacher, Drogan, sent me to find you.
Text: 전 <FirstName>이에요. 제 스승 드로건이 당신을 찾으라고 보내셨어요.

TextEng: You better tell me what you are doing here first.
Text: 먼저 여기서 뭘 하고 있는지 말해 줘요.

TextEng: What is this? <StartHighlight>[Show him the crystal.]</Start>
What happened to you? Why were you so hurt?
Text: 무슨 일이 있었던 거예요? 왜 이렇게 다쳤어요?

TextEng: I need you to tell me about this crystal.
What ever, just hurry up.
If it means you might start making sense, then do it.
Text: 그래야 말이 좀 되겠다 싶으면 해요.

TextEng: Please do.
No, go ahead.
What else do you know about it?
How do you damage one?
How do you know this?
Hurry up and get to the part where this makes sense.
Text: 빨리 알아들을 수 있게 말해 줘요.

TextEng: Go on.
I think I have seen this cloaked figure before. But go on.
Text: 그 망토 쓴 자, 전에 본 것 같아요. 근데 계속해요.

TextEng: Did you get to see the cloaked figure's face?
Did the cloaked figure come through the portal?
Text: 망토 쓴 자가 차원문으로 온 거예요?

TextEng: So she is gone, but the portal remains?
So she went through the portal?
Where is the excavation?
You keep the mythallar, while I go hunt this cloaked figure.
Text: 당신은 미살라를 지키고 있어요. 전 망토 쓴 자를 쫓을게요.

TextEng: You said the mythallar could be used as a weapon?
Text: 미살라가 무기로 쓰일 수 있다고 했죠?

TextEng: I guess I need to get this mythallar away from here.
What would you suggest I do?
I won't do it.
I suppose there is little choice.
I can't face her alone.
Will you come with me?
I guess I should get going.
I want to speak with Master Drogan.
Why don't I just wait and speak to Drogan.
Text: 그냥 기다렸다가 드로건 스승님과 이야기하면 안 될까요.

TextEng: I have some questions.
That's all my questions.
How do you know Drogan?
Go on.
Boring.
Interesting.
How do I activate the portal?
Where is the portal room?
Where is the excavation?
Who are you?
Goodbye.
I have some questions.
That's all my questions.
How do you know Drogan?
Go on.
Boring.
Interesting.
How do I activate the portal?
Where is the portal room?
Where is the excavation?
How goes the spell?
Could you summarize what I am supposed to do?
Text: 제가 뭘 해야 하는지 요약해 줄래요?

TextEng: I want you to tell me everything again.
